SourceCrawler
public class EclipseMarketplaceCrawler
extends java.lang.Object
implements SourceCrawler

eclipse marketplace api client that gets a number of update sites from the eclipse marketplace.

Author:
Shivanshu Singh

public void crawl()
Description copied from interface: SourceCrawler
crawls the source to create or refresh the siteURLs List. call getSites() after this to get the updated Sites List.
